underlying_goal: Set up Cloud SQL Studio IAM login for developers and PostgreSQL GRANT permissions via Terraform, including separate configuration, CI/CD pipelines, and Taskfile integration
friction_detail: Terraform plan failed due to missing remote state outputs (not yet applied), and Cloud SQL Auth Proxy failed because --private-ip flag was missing for a private-IP-only instance.
brief_summary: User asked to implement a multi-file Terraform plan for Cloud SQL IAM login and PostgreSQL grants, iteratively fixing proxy and state issues, and refactoring CI steps into a composite action; the implementation was mostly achieved with a PR created.
